scripts.setup: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const script = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'setup.bat' : 'bash setup.sh'; spawn(script, { shell: true, stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.setup:backend: bash -c 'cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.backend: bash -c 'cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver'
